unlock_description: Get access to all vision tests with detailed reports and tracking

visual_acuity.title: Visual Acuity Test
visual_acuity.description: Comprehensive clarity assessment using advanced Snellen methodology

vision_field.title: Vision Field Analysis
vision_field.description: Advanced peripheral vision mapping and blind spot detection

color_vision.title: Color Perception Test
color_vision.description: Professional Ishihara color vision deficiency screening

astigmatism.title: Astigmatism Screening
astigmatism.description: Precise corneal irregularity detection and measurement

amsler_grid.title: Amsler Grid Analysis
amsler_grid.description: Macular degeneration and central vision distortion screening

dry_eye.title: Dry Eye Assessment
dry_eye.description: Comprehensive tear film stability and eye comfort evaluation

dialog.title: Test Complete!
dialog.message: You have completed the visual acuity test. Please consult an eye care professional for a comprehensive evaluation.

instructions.title: Instructions
instructions.description: Read the smallest line you can see clearly, or identify the direction of the opening in each symbol. Test from the appropriate distance and cover one eye at a time if needed.

tips.title: ðŸ’¡ Testing Tips
tips.tip2: â€¢ Keep device at arm's length
tips.tip4: â€¢ Take breaks if eyes feel strained

instructions.title: Test Instructions
instructions.description: This test evaluates your peripheral vision by tracking a moving object while focusing on a central point.

steps.title: How to Take the Test
steps.step1: Keep your eyes focused on the center point at all times
steps.step2: Use your peripheral vision to track the moving red dot
steps.step3: Tap anywhere on screen when you lose sight of the moving object

warning.title: Important Notes
warning.message: This is a basic screening test. For comprehensive visual field assessment, please consult an eye care professional.

testing.instruction: Focus on the center â€¢ Tap when object disappears

complete.title: Test Complete
complete.result: Test completed. If you frequently lose sight of moving objects in your peripheral vision, consider consulting an eye care professional for a comprehensive visual field examination.

buttons.learn_more: ðŸ”— Learn more about visual field tests

instructions.title: Test Instructions
instructions.description: Focus on the central dot in the grid below. Observe if any lines appear wavy, distorted, missing, or blurred while keeping your focus on the center.

question.title: What do you observe?
question.description: While focusing on the central dot, do any of the lines appear wavy, distorted, or missing?

positive.title: Visual Disturbances Detected
positive.description: You've reported seeing distortions in the Amsler grid. This could indicate potential vision issues that may affect your central vision, such as macular problems or other retinal conditions.
positive.recommendation: We strongly recommend scheduling a comprehensive eye examination with an eye care professional for proper diagnosis and evaluation of your central vision.

negative.title: No Visual Disturbances Detected
negative.description: Excellent! If the grid appeared normal with straight, undistorted lines, your central vision screening appears normal. However, this is just a basic screening test.
negative.recommendation: Continue with regular eye exams as recommended by eye care professionals to maintain optimal eye health and monitor any changes over time.

tips.title: ðŸ’¡ Testing Tips
tips.tip1: â€¢ Keep your eyes focused on the center dot at all times
tips.tip2: â€¢ Test each eye separately if possible
tips.tip3: â€¢ View from your normal reading distance (12-14 inches)
tips.tip4: â€¢ Look for wavy, missing, or distorted grid lines

astigmatism.title: Astigmatism Test

instructions.title: Test Instructions
instructions.description: Look carefully at the lines in the image below. Observe if any lines appear blurry, wavy, distorted, or less clear than others.

astigmatism.chart_note: Focus on each set of lines and compare their clarity

question.title: What do you observe?
question.description: Do any of the lines appear blurry, wavy, or distorted compared to others?

positive.title: Possible Astigmatism Detected
positive.description: Based on your response, you may have astigmatism. This is a common refractive error that causes blurred or distorted vision due to an irregularly shaped cornea or lens.
positive.recommendation: Consider scheduling a comprehensive eye examination with an eye care professional for proper diagnosis and treatment options, which may include corrective lenses or other treatments.

negative.title: No Astigmatism Detected
negative.description: Great! If all lines appeared clear and straight, you likely don't have significant astigmatism symptoms. However, this is just a basic screening test.
negative.recommendation: Continue with regular eye exams as recommended by eye care professionals to maintain optimal eye health and catch any changes early.

tips.title: ðŸ’¡ Testing Tips
tips.tip1: â€¢ View the image from your normal reading distance
tips.tip2: â€¢ Ensure you have good lighting conditions
tips.tip3: â€¢ Test each eye separately if possible
tips.tip4: â€¢ Take your time to carefully observe all lines

instructions.title: Test Instructions
instructions.description: Look at the colored dots below and identify any number or letter you can see hidden within the pattern.

hint_dialog.title: ðŸ’¡ Helpful Hint
hint_dialog.message: Focus on the different colors and shades in the dot pattern. Numbers or letters are formed by dots of similar colors grouping together. If you have difficulty seeing any pattern, that information is also valuable for assessment.

result.title: Test Results
result.excellent: Excellent! Your color vision appears to be normal.
result.good: Good results, but consider consulting an eye care professional for a comprehensive examination.
result.consult: Consider consulting an eye care professional for a thorough color vision assessment.

tips.title: ðŸ’¡ Testing Tips
tips.tip1: â€¢ Look for patterns formed by different colored dots
tips.tip2: â€¢ Take your time - there's no rush
tips.tip3: â€¢ If you can't see anything, that's also valid information
tips.tip4: â€¢ Ensure good lighting conditions for accurate results

instructions.title: Symptom Checklist
instructions.description: Select all symptoms you have experienced in the past few days. This will help assess your dry eye condition.

symptoms.foreign_body: Feeling like something is in your eye

dryness.title: Mild Dry Eye Symptoms
dryness.description: You are experiencing dryness. This is a common sign of dry eye.
dryness.recommendation: Consider using artificial tears and monitoring your symptoms. Take regular breaks from screen time and ensure proper hydration.

irritation.title: Mild Irritation Detected
irritation.description: Irritation or burning could be related to dry eye or environmental factors.
irritation.recommendation: Consider using lubricating eye drops and taking breaks from screens. Avoid dry environments when possible.

redness.title: Eye Redness Detected
redness.description: Redness could be a sign of dry eye or other conditions.
redness.recommendation: Consider consulting an eye care professional if redness persists. Use artificial tears and avoid eye rubbing.

foreign_body.title: Foreign Body Sensation
foreign_body.description: The sensation of something in your eye could indicate dry eye or another condition.
foreign_body.recommendation: Use lubricating eye drops and consult a professional if the sensation persists. Avoid touching or rubbing your eyes.

sensitivity.title: Light Sensitivity Detected
sensitivity.description: Sensitivity to light can be associated with dry eye or other issues.
sensitivity.recommendation: Wear sunglasses outdoors and consider consulting an eye care professional if sensitivity persists.

multiple.title: Multiple Symptoms Detected
multiple.description: You have selected multiple symptoms which may indicate moderate to severe dry eye syndrome.
multiple.recommendation: It's recommended to consult an eye care professional for a comprehensive evaluation and personalized treatment plan.

none.title: No Dry Eye Symptoms
none.description: You don't seem to have symptoms of dry eye currently.
none.recommendation: Continue with regular eye check-ups to maintain good eye health. Practice good eye hygiene and take screen breaks.

tips.title: ðŸ’¡ Assessment Tips
tips.tip1: â€¢ Consider symptoms from the past 2-3 days
tips.tip2: â€¢ Be honest about frequency and severity
tips.tip3: â€¢ Think about symptoms during different activities
tips.tip4: â€¢ Consider environmental factors that may affect you

perfect_score.title: Perfectionist
perfect_score.description: Get a perfect score on any challenge

ai_chat.title: AI Assistant
ai_chat.disclaimer: I'm an AI assistant, not a real doctor. This is educational information only, not medical advice. Please see a real eye doctor for actual diagnosis or treatment.
ai_chat.quick_1: I have dry eyes, what can I do?
ai_chat.quick_3: Eye care tips for screen time
ai_chat.quick_4: When should I see an eye doctor?
